channel.title: Vocabularies on lipdverse
channel.description: Recent content in Vocabularies on lipdverse

item.title: archiveType
item.description: The physical medium in which the response of a proxy sensor to environmental forcing is recorded and upon which the proxy measurements were made.

item.title: interpretation_seasonality
item.description: The part of the year that proxy is sensitive to environmental or climatic conditions

item.title: interpretation_variable
item.description: The phenomenon that drove variability in this measured or inferred variable at the column level

item.title: paleoData_proxy
item.description: Physical, chemical, and/or biological systems or components that react to environmental or climatic conditions, and imprint onto the archive.

item.title: paleoData_units
item.description: The units of a measured or inferred variable at the column level.

item.title: paleoData_variableName
item.description: The name of a measured or inferred variable at the column level.
